message.body: I know this is a long shot, but do you have/know of a projector that could be borrowed for a girls rock event on Saturday? No children would be using it, I promise.
I just asked Dave if penn could lend me one lol. But they probably don't even have one available
I will ask around! Ours is bolted to a shelf upside down, really hard to take off and match framing for the screen. Took us hours. Dave should give you one!!!
Thanks for asking! I agree that Dave should give me one
Yes! Count how many times she mentions teaching at Chicago.
I have a meeting at temple tmw are you free for lunch?
I am at this conference thingie all day but we get a lunch break!
My meeting is 10-11. Not sure it will take that long but I will text you and see where you are!
Okay! My lunch break is from 12-1:30
Maybe I can sneak you in for free Sodexho buffet
Lol. Mmmmmmm. I hope they have French fries!
It's probably all turkey sandwiches and bag salad
